text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haa, haah, haa……! Finally done with beach running～

The annual summer training camp had begun. 
I hoped to gain a burst of improvement here to 
take into races, however —

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text: …… Lil' Ines? It really is, knew I recognized you!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hueeh!? Is that you, Mister Beach?!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! He often helped me out back home! 
I heard he'd moved, but I never thought I'd find him here……!

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text:
That's what I wanna say! I knew you attended Tracen Academy 
but to think I'd see you again like this～

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text:
I'm running a beach bar here nowdays. 
Do come drop by later if you got time!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: For sure! We'll be there!

After training, we made good on the invitation 
and headed to the beach bar, but —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hmmm. It looks super duper busy……

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text: Oh, lil' Ines! Sorry I don't got much time for yeh now～

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text:
It's ain't like this most days, but when the summer festival 
rolls 'round there's always a big increase in customers…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Makes sense～……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, you got me.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I'll make sure it doesn't affect my training, so can I —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Actually, I want you to come with me! Please!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Here you go! Two large yakisoba!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I have your grilled carrot and tropical drink right here. Enjoy～!

text_block_list.name: Man A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! I'd like to order!

text_block_list.name: Young Woman A
text_block_list.text: Where's the Blue Hawaii I ordered?
choice_data_list: I'm sorry! Just a minute please!

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text:
You good, kid? It don't look like you got 
a lot of experience doing this……

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text:
You alright there? It don't look like you got 
a lot of experience doing this……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Don't worry! I know you're starting to, but give it a bit.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
It might not be immediately clear, 
but my trainer can be quite reliable♪

I thought to myself that I had to live up to her expectations 
no matter what and returned direction kitchen.
By the time of the summer festival —
choice_data_list: Here you go, one ramen set!

text_block_list.name: Young Woman B
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, already? 
Thank you～!

text_block_list.name: Young Woman B
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, already? 
Thank you～!

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text: Hoowee～ I wasn't sure at first but you really grew into this!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I told you so♪

text_block_list.name: Beach Bar Owner
text_block_list.text:
It's been a big help having you both here. 
The crowds have calmed a bit now so why 
don't the two of you head off to the festival!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Okay! Let's go, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Mmmm～! I love having a honey drink after work～♪

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You too♪ 
Thanks for coming with me!
choice_data_list:
I thought you were about to run 
off to help on your own at first.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Mmm. I think I would have, before.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You always seemed kind of a klutz and in need of help 
more often than helping, you know?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! But that's not so much the case anymore.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You don't always look it, but I know you're someone 
who can do it when you put your mind to it, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
That's why I felt I could rely on you a little today. 
Wasn't wrong, was I?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Aah, and you were so unreliable when we first met～ 
Really, where's all that gone?
choice_data_list:
I want you to be able to count on me, 
and run to your heart's content.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I see……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Oh what a siiight! 
There's fireworks all over the sky!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
But you know… if I had to do everything alone… 
I think I'd have been too busy to pay attention to 
summer festivals and fireworks.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Maybe summer festivals are fun and the fireworks so 
beautiful because of a certain someone, hmm?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad I enrolled at the academy. I'm glad I could 
come to summer camp. ……I'm glad I met you!

text_block_list.name: Bandaged Up Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
If I'd known… I don't want it to end like this…… 
I wish I'd never met you……!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Maan, look at your face! 
If you're happy then smile, smile!

Glad she met me… Having been told that, I need 
to become a more reliable trainer, for her.
choice_data_list: Yeah! I'll keep working hard for yoy —
Yeah! I'll keep working hard for yoy —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Pffft!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Maaaan～! You have to be cool the whole way through if you're gonna say stuff like that!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I'll keep counting on you, Trainer♪

There's a mischievous smile on Ines Fujin's face, 
but her eyes are full of warmth.
